name: arcstack
description: This Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform offers an extensive array of applications catering to diverse needs. Its ecosystem hosts a multifaceted suite of tools and services, each designed to streamline and enhance various aspects of operations across industries.
author: Arnab Hazra

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run start:dev --prefix apps/server" "pnpm run dev --prefix apps/client"
scripts.publish: git add . && git commit -m publish && git push
